channel.title: Always the same error, and I've seemed to have done everything
channel.description:
Every time I try to log onto my server "scapescape.no-ip.info", I always get the same error when trying to log onto it.
"Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own"
The thing is, I had no problem compiling, or starting the server, but it just seems no matter what I do, I cannot get onto my own server, which means nobody else can.
I've done everything right, no problems with java, i've port forwarded and got the no-ip program and have it running, and I've made sure that the actuall text of the runserver is working.
Here's another weird thing, whenever I do actually click "Start Server" then log on to the server made by mopar, I log on perfectly no problems.
Any help would be greatly appreciated.
EDIT: Also, I don't know if this will effect anything, but I'm using pj16 as a source, but I think I might switch to another one soon and see if that helps anything

item.title: Always the same error, and I've seemed to have done everything
item.dc:creator: @trogdor7190 trogdor7190
item.description:
@trogdor7190 wrote:

[quote=“peanut dance, post:2, topic:229158”]maybe your server has a lot of custom/new items, and moparscape client only has old ones.
try logging in here: client.silabsoft.org[/quote]Nope, still nothing.

I’m just wondering how the heck I can get on whenever I just use the “start server”, but not whenever I try to use scapescape.no-ip.info[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2008, 09:27:19 pm[/size][hr]Sorry for the double post, but I’d also like to say that I’m using pj16 as a source, if that effects anything

Read full topic
item.source: Always the same error, and I've seemed to have done everything

item.description:
@peanut_dance wrote:

maybe your server has a lot of custom/new items, and moparscape client only has old ones.
try logging in here: client.silabsoft.org

item.description:
@trogdor7190 wrote:

Every time I try to log onto my server “scapescape.no-ip.info”, I always get the same error when trying to log onto it.

“Error connecting to server. Must be down.
Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own”

The thing is, I had no problem compiling, or starting the server, but it just seems no matter what I do, I cannot get onto my own server, which means nobody else can.

I’ve done everything right, no problems with java, i’ve port forwarded and got the no-ip program and have it running, and I’ve made sure that the actuall text of the runserver is working.

Here’s another weird thing, whenever I do actually click “Start Server” then log on to the server made by mopar, I log on perfectly no problems.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

EDIT: Also, I don’t know if this will effect anything, but I’m using pj16 as a source, but I think I might switch to another one soon and see if that helps anything
